EmailTemplate.subject: FW: Out of Office AutoReply (1317751950.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Jon,
I haven’t heard back from Bridget and I attempted to send her an email and got an out of office response (below). Do you know who the proper person for me to contact to have a discussion about the contract (and provide me with their phone number/email) ?
Please advise,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Bridget Pulivarti [mailto:bpulivarti@helioshr.com] Sent: Tuesday, October 04, 2011 11:28 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Out of Office AutoReply
Hello,
I will be out of the office until October , 2011. I will respond to emails as soon as I return.
For an immediate need please contact:
Judy Mckenney at (240) 793-4586 or email jmckenney@helioshr.com
or
Helen Trainor at (301) 639-0447 or email htrainor@helioshr.com
Have a great weekend!
Warmly, Bridget
BRIDGET PULIVARTI, SPHR | Practice Director, Government Contracting & Recruitment | Helios HR 1925 Isaac Newton Square, Suite 200, Reston, VA 20190 d. 770.639-6589 | o. 703.860.3882 | f. 703.852.7375 | bpulivarti@helioshr.com | www.helioshr.com
